text: There is a boundary to men's passions when they act from feelings but none when they are under the influence of imagination.
author: Edmund Burke

text: God is in all men, but all men are not in God that is why we suffer.
author: Ramakrishna

text: Most of us women like men, you know it's just that we find them a constant disappointment.
author: Clare Short

text: Men think highly of those who rise rapidly in the world whereas nothing rises quicker than dust, straw, and feathers.
author: Lord Byron

text: A great city is that which has the greatest men and women.
author: Walt Whitman
